function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven population distribution in a building at certain hours of the day","Impact":"Drastically increases the number of infected people","Mitigation":"Implement staggered class schedules or flexible working hours to even out population distribution","Technologies":"Scheduling software, occupancy sensors","People":"Building occupants, students, workers","Owner":"Employers, school administrators, building managers"},{"Description":"Poor alignment of occupant distribution with climatic conditions","Impact":"Increases energy consumption and the number of infected people","Mitigation":"Implement smart building systems to adjust occupant distribution based on climate","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, occupancy tracking sensors","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Building managers, building owners"}]}
